description: {"blocks":[{"key":"dim2f","text":"The GSK3 inhibitor and Wnt inhibitor, named GiWi2, are utilized for robust differentiation of human pluripotent stem cells (hPSCs) into cardiomyocytes under serum-free and growth factor-free conditions. This differentiation protocol, developed previously by Dr. Xiaojun Lian (Nat Methods. 2015 Jul; 12(7): 595–596), applies two small molecules at precise developmental stages to sequentially promote mesoderm formation and ventricular cardiomyocyte (vCM) specification. The protocol produces 88–98% cTnT+ cells with yields exceeding 1×10^6 cardiomyocytes/cm² across multiple human embryonic stem cell (hESC) and human induced pluripotent stem cell (hiPSC) lines. The resulting cardiomyocytes exhibit spontaneous contraction for over eight months, demonstrating their functionality and long-term viability. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"8e7gg","text":"Matrigel (life science, cat# 354230)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8},{"style":"italic","offset":10,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f0b2h","text":"Y27632 (Tocris, cat# 1254), 5 mM Y27632 stock (1:1000)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6},{"style":"italic","offset":8,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dund","text":"TeSR-E8 (Stem Cell Technologies, cat# 05990): Thaw TeSR-E8 25X Supplement at room temperature (15-25℃) or overnight at 2 - 8℃. Add 20 mL of TeSR-E8 25X Supplement to 480 mL of TeSR-E8 Basal Medium. Mix thoroughly. Store complete medium at 2 - 8℃ for up to 2 weeks. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7},{"style":"italic","offset":9,"length":34}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"kgvl","text":"Accutase (Innovative Cell Technology, cat# AT104)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8},{"style":"italic","offset":10,"length":39}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7847g","text":"CHIR99021 (Selleckchem, cat# S1263-25mg): 10 mM CHIR99021 stock","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9},{"style":"italic","offset":11,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fks7n","text":"IWP2 (Tocris, cat# 3533-10mg): 5 mM IWP2 stock","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4},{"style":"italic","offset":6,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atdu0","text":"Insulin (Sigma, cat# 91077C-250MG): 5 mg/mL in stock (1:500)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7},{"style":"italic","offset":9,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2g5b8","text":"RPMI (Life Technologies, cat# 11875-085)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4},{"style":"italic","offset":6,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31m8b","text":"B-27 Minus Insulin (Gibco, cat# A18956-01 ), 50X for RPMI-B27 [RPMI1640 (Life Technologies); 2% B-27 Supplement Minus Insulin (B27-Insulin)]","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19},{"style":"italic","offset":26,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2b4","text":"L-Ascorbic acid 2-phosphate sesquimagnesium (Sigma, cat# A8960-5G): 50 mg/mL in stock (1:250) ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":43},{"style":"italic","offset":45,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2gjt","text":"Cardiomyocyte Maintenance Medium (CMM):  RPMI1640 supplemented with 10 μg/mL of insulin and 200 μg/mL of L-Ascorbic acid 2-phosphate sesquimagnesium.  Add 0.5 mL of insulin stock (5 mg/mL) and 1 mL of ascorbic acid (50 mg/mL) to 250 mL of RPMI1640 basal medium. Sterilize by filtration and store at 4°C.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":38}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjgp4","text":"Freezing medium (2X): 20% DMSO, 60% defined FBS, 20% hES cell culture medium, and need to add fresh 10 μM Y27632 (ROCKi).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"f3jcj","text":"1. Lian X, Zhang J, Azarin SM, Zhu K, Hazeltine LB, Bao X, Hsiao C, Kamp TJ, Palecek SP. Directed cardiomyocyte differentiation from human pluripotent stem cells by modulating Wnt/β-catenin signaling under fully defined conditions. Nat Protoc. 2013 Jan;8(1):162-75. doi: 10.1038/nprot.2012.150. Epub 2012 Dec 20. PMID: 23257984; PMCID: PMC3612968.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4cslv","text":"2. Lian X, Bao X, Zilberter M, Westman M, Fisahn A, Hsiao C, Hazeltine LB, Dunn KK, Kamp TJ, Palecek SP. Chemically defined, albumin-free human cardiomyocyte generation. Nat Methods. 2015 Jul;12(7):595-6. doi: 10.1038/nmeth.3448. PMID: 26125590; PMCID: PMC4663075.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fgsoi","text":"Matrigel (life science, cat# 354230)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8},{"style":"italic","offset":10,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ta9k","text":"Y27632 (Tocris, cat# 1254), 5 mM Y27632 stock (1:1000)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6},{"style":"italic","offset":8,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jfng","text":"TeSR-E8 (Stem Cell Technologies, cat# 05990): Thaw TeSR-E8 25X Supplement at room temperature (15-25℃) or overnight at 2 - 8℃. Add 20 mL of TeSR-E8 25X Supplement to 480 mL of TeSR-E8 Basal Medium. Mix thoroughly. Store complete medium at 2 - 8℃ for up to 2 weeks. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7},{"style":"italic","offset":9,"length":34}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"caqf3","text":"Accutase (Innovative Cell Technology, cat# AT104)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8},{"style":"italic","offset":10,"length":39}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7le9d","text":"CHIR99021 (Selleckchem, cat# S1263-25mg): 10 mM CHIR99021 stock","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9},{"style":"italic","offset":11,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"70asf","text":"IWP2 (Tocris, cat# 3533-10mg): 5 mM IWP2 stock","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4},{"style":"italic","offset":6,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8f19p","text":"Insulin (Sigma, cat# 91077C-250MG): 5 mg/mL in stock (1:500)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7},{"style":"italic","offset":9,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9livm","text":"RPMI (Life Technologies, cat# 11875-085)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4},{"style":"italic","offset":6,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ovoa","text":"B-27 Minus Insulin (Gibco, cat# A18956-01 ), 50X for RPMI-B27 [RPMI1640 (Life Technologies); 2% B-27 Supplement Minus Insulin (B27-Insulin)]","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19},{"style":"italic","offset":26,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6seqb","text":"L-Ascorbic acid 2-phosphate sesquimagnesium (Sigma, cat# A8960-5G): 50 mg/mL in stock (1:250) ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":43},{"style":"italic","offset":45,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6kc4k","text":"Cardiomyocyte Maintenance Medium (CMM):  RPMI1640 supplemented with 10 μg/mL of insulin and 200 μg/mL of L-Ascorbic acid 2-phosphate sesquimagnesium.  Add 0.5 mL of insulin stock (5 mg/mL) and 1 mL of ascorbic acid (50 mg/mL) to 250 mL of RPMI1640 basal medium. Sterilize by filtration and store at 4°C.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":38}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ren8","text":"Freezing medium (2X): 20% DMSO, 60% defined FBS, 20% hES cell culture medium, and need to add fresh 10 μM Y27632 (ROCKi).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"59opk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ae0t8","text":"Robust spontaneous contraction should occur by day 12. The cells can be maintained with this spontaneously beating phenotype for more than 6 months.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8l4tj","text":"Day 7 Change medium with CMM: On day 7 of differentiation and every 2 days thereafter, aspirate the medium from each well of the 12-well plate and add room-temperature RPMI medium supplemented/filtered together with B27(with insulin) and 10 µg/mL insulin and 200 µg/mL L-Ascorbic acid 2-phosphate sesquimagnesium salt hydrate at a volume of 2 mL per well. Put the plate back into the 37 C, 5% CO2 incubator. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":30},{"style":"sub","offset":395,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"97pd","text":"(Day -2) Passaging hPSCs using Accutane: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":41}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bjhnf","text":"Prepare a Matrigel-coated 6-well plate and store it at 4°C, put it at room temperature at least 1 hour before use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5pcvf","text":"Remove a frozen cell vial of hPSCs, from a liquid N2 tank and immerse the vial in a 37°C water bath without submerging the cap. Swirl the vial gently for 2 - 3 min until the contents are almost completely thawed.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":51,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"57ds5","text":"Spray the vial with 70% (v/v) ethanol and place it in a tissue culture hood. Use a sterile 1-mL pipette to gently transfer the cells into a sterile 15-mL conical tube containing 5 mL of room temperature mTeSR1 medium. Rinse the cell tube a few times without disturbing \"little\" cell clusters.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"29uug","text":"Centrifuge the cells at 200 g for 5 min at room temperature. Aspirate and discard the supernatant with a sterilized electronic pipette. Resuspend the cell pellet in 2 mL of TeSR-E8 medium(with 5 μM ROCKi), and gently resuspend the cells without disturbing \"little\" cell clusters.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cic35","text":"Aspirate the liquid from the wells of the Matrigel-coated plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7j006","text":"Slowly add the cell suspension to the Matrigel-coated 6-well plate. Put the plate back into the 37°C, 5% CO2 incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":107,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ig3u","text":"The next day, aspirate the medium in each well and replace it with 2 mL of fresh room temperature mTeSR-E8 medium (without ROCKi). Repeat this medium replacement daily until cells are ready for passage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f4j0p","text":"Passage the cells with EDTA-method: Asprite the medium and wash once with DPBS. Add 1 mL 0.5 mM EDTA-DPBS buffer to each well to dissociate the cells. Incubate for 3 - 5 min at 37°C and observe with microscopy. Asprite the EDTA buffer. Add 1 mL TESR-E8 with Rock-inhibitor (1:1000) to the cells and gently detach them by pipetting them up and down. Transfer the cells to a 15 mL tube with 5 mL TESR-E8 (with ROCKi), and rinse the well with 1 mL medium. Add the cells to a Matrigel-coated plate (6 wells).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9qcis","text":"Day 5 Remove Wnt inhibitor IWP2: On day 5 of differentiation, aspirate the medium from each well of the 12-well plate and add room-temperature RPMI-B27 medium at a volume of 2 mL per well. Put the plate back into the 37°C, 5% CO2 incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":33},{"style":"sub","offset":228,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0n8p","text":"Take hPSCs cultured on Matrigel-coated 6-wells in mTeSR1 medium at 80-90% confluence. Aspirate medium and wash once with DPBS. Add 1 mL of room-temp Accutase to each 6-well. Place plate in 37°C, 5% CO2 incubator for ~5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":200,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cjucc","text":"Day 3 add Wnt inhibitor IWP2: On day 3 of differentiation, prepare the combined medium by using a 5 mL pipette to collect 1 mL of medium from the 12-well plate; mix it with 1mL of fresh RPMI-B27 medium in a 15 mL conical. Add 1 μl of 5 mM IWP2 (final conc. is 2.5 µM) into the 2 mL of combined medium. Before aspirating 1 mL of the remaining medium in the well of the 12-well plate, gently rock the plate back and forth to get cell debris into suspension, ensuring that the cell debris will be discarded via aspiration. Aspirate the remaining 1 mL of medium from each well of the 12-well plate, and then add 2 mL per well of the combined medium containing IWP2 to each well and incubate the cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ifp0","text":"Day 1 Remove GSK3 inhibitor CHIR99021. After 24 h, aspirate medium from each well and replace with 2 mL of room-temp RPMI-B27. Put the plate back into 37°C, 5% CO2 incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":39},{"style":"sub","offset":162,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ff1et","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2oegi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5hai7","text":"\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4jif","text":"If a lot of cell death/detachment is observed, which might be less than the optimal initial seeding density or too much CHIR (concentration vs time).","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4db8h","text":"Add 0.5 mL mTeSR1 to each well and gently detach the cells by pipetting the cells up and down and pool the cells in a 15-mL conical tube. Count total cells and centrifuge at 200 g for 5 minutes at room temp.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ilj1","text":"Day 0 Add GSK3 inhibitor CHIR99021: On day 0 of differentiation, prepare 2 mL of 6 µM CHIR99021 in RPMI-B27 medium for each well of 12-well. Aspirate the old medium and add 2 mL of this mixture to each\nwell. Record the time, as the medium needs to be changed exactly 24 hours later.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":36},{"style":"bold","offset":208,"length":74}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7va9h","text":"Aspirate supernatant, resuspend cells in TeSR-E8 + 5 µM Y27632, and plate 200 k cells/cm2 (i.e. ~700 k cells/3.5 cm2 for 12-well) onto Matrigel-coated plate. Add TeSR-E8 + 5 µM Y27632 medium to each well to obtain a final volume of 1 mL in each well of the 12-well plate. Incubate the cells. Move the plate in quick, short, back-and-forth, and side-to-side motions to disperse the cells across the surface of the wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":88,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":115,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"go1m","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4mg2t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"654ru","text":"1)   This time point corresponds to Day -2 of differentiation.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":1,"offset":95,"style":"sup"}],"key":"clg81","text":"2)   Seeding density is crucial: recommended cell density by day 0 should be 250-400 k cells/cm2.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0dic","text":"Day -1 Maintenance:  On day -1 of differentiation, aspirate the medium and replace it with 2 mL of room temperature TeSR-E8 per well of the 12-well plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"o2j7","text":"1. Lian X, Zhang J, Azarin SM, Zhu K, Hazeltine LB, Bao X, Hsiao C, Kamp TJ, Palecek SP. Directed cardiomyocyte differentiation from human pluripotent stem cells by modulating Wnt/β-catenin signaling under fully defined conditions. Nat Protoc. 2013 Jan;8(1):162-75. doi: 10.1038/nprot.2012.150. Epub 2012 Dec 20. PMID: 23257984; PMCID: PMC3612968.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8t1ca","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkamh","text":"2. Lian X, Bao X, Zilberter M, Westman M, Fisahn A, Hsiao C, Hazeltine LB, Dunn KK, Kamp TJ, Palecek SP. Chemically defined, albumin-free human cardiomyocyte generation. Nat Methods. 2015 Jul;12(7):595-6. doi: 10.1038/nmeth.3448. PMID: 26125590; PMCID: PMC4663075.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Directed cardiomyocte generation from human pluripotent stem cells using a chemically defined protocol (GiWi2)
title_html: Directed cardiomyocte generation from human pluripotent stem cells using a chemically defined protocol (GiWi2)
